modName: New potions and poisons -over 40 new specifics-
summary:
New potions and poisons (over 40 new specifics)
New effects of potions and new visual effects
New textures for bottles
descriptionHtml:
HI ALL :)

[ENG] The modification adds over 40 completely new potions and poisons.
[PL] Modyfikacja dodaje ponad 40 nowych mikstur i trucizn.
UPDATE avaliable - Stronger effects-lower prices. Adds 3 potions to buy ...

[youtube]KWmF8dRTQes[/youtube] 

Recommend see all the photos
what exactly ...

Game-specific descriptions will be displayed according to your language settings
its STAND ALONE WERSION (no replace, only ADD NEW potions and poisons)

0 - Completely NEW connections different effects.
1 - Over 40 NEW specifics (available at [RIVWRWOD TRADER])
2 - New UNIQUE texture for each one bottle.
3 - The several potions Added on Visual Effects (you can see the screenshots)
4 - Three unique potions can only be found in the game world (you can not buy them)
5 - Textures this modification does not turn bottles default textures in the game. (So if you have modifications to the textures of bottles, nothing lose)

REQUIREMENTS *** 1.9.29 version of the game ... or higher - DLC DRAGONBORN ***

Compatibility - mod will not have any conflicts with other modifications of this type-it is an independent addition-
Only in the case of a merchant Lucan (if different mod adds products to the store can be a problem, depending on what the queue loading modifications - or disappear from the store \"old\" goods, or will not be able to buy new mixture)

do you like the mod please endorse :)
P. S.
 If the modification is positively received, as time will be a new update with new specifics :)

We also recommend ...

NEW HD textures for INTERFACE and sounds -- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27980
V740T NEW ErA bottles of potions and poisons -- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35413
MEGA PACK - MUSIC SOUNDS and EFFECTS - for SKYRIM - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27447
author: vito740
